Subject: [Native-Amer-Medicine] Pneumococcal Vaccine Petition


> From: "Little Otter" <onetsalagi1@...>
>
> Pneumococcal Vaccine aka Prevnar Petition
> Ok folks, here it is! The site to post your signature and comments in

> those
> of you who do not know or have forgotten, this is the vaccine the
> government
> wants to test on minority (OUR) children. This chemial is already
> known to
> cause diabetes, which our people are already suffering from. Do
> something!!!
> http://www.petitiononline.com/Vaccine/petition.html
> SEND THIS LINK FAR AND WIDE TO EVERYONE YOU KNOW. LETS GET THE WORD
> OUT
> PEOPLE!
> OUR CHILDREN ARE NOT THEIR LAB RATS!!! THIS IS GEN0CIDE, AND WE CAN
> NOT
> ALLOW IT!!!!
>
>
